title: Beef Stir Fry
description: Quick and flavorful beef stir fry with vegetables
instructions: Slice beef into thin strips against the grain.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, and beef broth.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add beef and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until browned. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil to the same pan and stir-fry vegetables for 3-4 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Return beef to pan and add sauce mixture.
Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until sauce thickens.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.
notes: Make sure your pan is very hot for proper stir-frying. Don't overcrowd the pan or the vegetables will steam instead of stir-fry.
